pr_title: Add metrics for active and live validators

timeline.message: Remove old, incorrect, unused epoch metrics.
Add active and live validator metrics.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into participation
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into participation
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into participation
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into participation

timeline.author: cemozerr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,6 +104,63 @@ public BeaconChainMetrics(
         "previous_justified_root",
         "Current previously justified root",
         this::getPreviousJustifiedRootValue);
+
+    previousLiveValidators =
+        SettableGauge.create(
+            metricsSystem,
+            TekuMetricCategory.BEACON,
+            "previous_live_validators",
+            "Number of active validators that successfully included attestation on chain for previous epoch");
+    currentLiveValidators =
+        SettableGauge.create(
+            metricsSystem,
+            TekuMetricCategory.BEACON,
+            "current_live_validators",
+            "Number of active validators that successfully included attestation on chain for previous epoch");

timeline.author: cemozerr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,6 +104,63 @@ public BeaconChainMetrics(
         "previous_justified_root",
         "Current previously justified root",
         this::getPreviousJustifiedRootValue);
+
+    previousLiveValidators =
+        SettableGauge.create(
+            metricsSystem,
+            TekuMetricCategory.BEACON,
+            "previous_live_validators",
+            "Number of active validators that successfully included attestation on chain for previous epoch");
+    currentLiveValidators =
+        SettableGauge.create(
+            metricsSystem,
+            TekuMetricCategory.BEACON,
+            "current_live_validators",
+            "Number of active validators that successfully included attestation on chain for previous epoch");
+    currentActiveValidators =
+        SettableGauge.create(
+            metricsSystem,
+            TekuMetricCategory.BEACON,
+            "current_active_validators",
+            "Number of active validators");

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:PegaSysEng/teku into participation
